1.Seed 3 x 10<sup>6</sup> cells \(BMDCs or BMMΦs) in 60 x 15 mm non-treated cell culture dishes at a concentration of 10<sup>6</sup> cells/ml in the appropriate medium.
Wash cells three times with 3 ml of pre-warmed PBS to
Move residual extracellular esterases contained in the medium.
4.Add 1 ml of 2 microM of the ratiometric probe indo-1 \(Molecular Probes, Eugene, OR) in PBS and
Wash cells three times with 3 ml of pre-warmed PBS to
Perfuse the appropriate stimulus in 200 μl PBS.
